data.description: Tk::Wizard pages for user file/dir choices
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Several years ago, comp.lang.perl.tk agreed on use of the
    Tk::Wizard namespace. As part of a refactoring, Tk::Wizard is now
    being stripped down and this is one module to come out of it.
    Once-standard features now reside here, so this module name requires
    some protetcion.
